title: Mango yoghurt with cardamom and pistachio

ingredients.details: medium, peeled and flesh cut into 1cm cubes
broken open and seeds lightly crushed

instructions: Reserve a couple of handfuls of the mango cubes. Put the remaining mango in a food processor with the caster sugar, crushed cardamom seeds and nutmeg; blitz to a smooth pure√©.
Add the greek yoghurt and blitz together until well mixed. Divide between 6 glasses, then top each one with a few cubes of mango and a sprinkling of chopped pistachios.
imageDesc: Two glasses of cold mango lassi, decorated with chunks of fruit and nuts.
